gateway.subtitle: Education Platform
gateway.title: Grow Together With Us
gateway.description: From digital basics to career skills, all the education you need for life in Korea in one place
gateway.footer: Â© 2024 Kiosk Seven. Education platform for migrants and international students

digitalBasics.name: Digital Basics
digitalBasics.description: From computer and smartphone basics to using essential Korean apps

modules.computerBasicsDesc: Turning on a computer, using mouse and keyboard, file management basics
modules.internetDesc: Using web browsers, searching, writing and managing emails
modules.smartphoneDesc: Installing apps, managing photos, using messengers
modules.koreaAppsDesc: KakaoTalk, Naver, delivery apps, map apps and more

marketing.name: Marketing Skills
marketing.description: SNS marketing, content creation, and online sales practical skills

modules.socialMediaDesc: Instagram, YouTube, TikTok channel management and marketing strategies
modules.contentCreationDesc: Photo editing, video production, making card news
modules.ecommerceDesc: Smart Store, Coupang, international selling platforms
modules.analyticsDesc: Marketing performance measurement, Google Analytics basics

career.name: Career Skills
career.description: Resume writing, interview prep, and understanding Korean workplace culture

modules.resumeDesc: Korean-style resume and cover letter writing
modules.interviewDesc: Expected interview questions, answer strategies, mock interviews
modules.workplaceDesc: Korean workplace etiquette, communication, conflict resolution

digital.title: Build Strong Digital Foundations!
digital.description: Learn computer and smartphone skills the easy way

marketing.title: Marketing Skills Through SNS
marketing.description: Master Instagram and YouTube channel management

career.title: First Step to Career Success
career.description: From resume to interview, complete job prep A to Z

koreaApps.title: Essential Korean Apps
koreaApps.subtitle: All the apps you need for life in Korea! Install and learn to use maps, transit, delivery, and shopping apps.

tips.title: App Tips
tips.tip1: Most apps support Korean, English, and Chinese. You can change the language in settings.
tips.tip2: One Kakao account lets you access multiple Kakao services (KakaoTalk, KakaoMap, Kakao T).
tips.tip3: If your foreign card doesn't work, register it with KakaoPay or NaverPay for payments.

categories.mapsNavigationDesc: Essential for finding your way in Korea!

naverMap.name: Naver Map
naverMap.description: The most accurate Korean map. Public transit, walking, and driving directions with real-time traffic.

kakaomap.name: KakaoMap
kakaomap.description: Map app integrated with Kakao. Easily call a taxi with Kakao Taxi integration.

kakaoT.name: Kakao T
kakaoT.description: Taxi, designated driver, parking, bike - all in one app. Essential for taxi rides in Korea!

subwayKorea.name: Subway Korea
subwayKorea.description: Nationwide subway map and real-time arrival info. Supports English, Chinese, Japanese.

papago.name: Papago
papago.description: Naver's AI translation app. Text, voice, image, and conversation translation all supported.

naverDictionary.name: Naver Dictionary
naverDictionary.description: Essential for learning Korean! Comprehensive dictionary with definitions, examples, and pronunciation.

coupangEats.name: Coupang Eats
coupangEats.description: Single-person delivery specialist! Fast delivery and various restaurants. English supported.

shuttleDelivery.name: Shuttle Delivery
shuttleDelivery.description: Delivery app for foreigners. Order in English and pay with foreign cards.

coupang.name: Coupang
coupang.description: Korea's largest shopping mall famous for Rocket Delivery. Dawn and same-day delivery available.

karrot.name: Karrot
karrot.description: Neighborhood-based secondhand trading app. Buy and sell safely with local neighbors.

creatrip.name: Creatrip
creatrip.description: Korea travel info for foreign tourists. Discount coupons and reservation services.

waug.name: Waug
waug.description: Book Korean activities, tours, and tickets. Various experiences made easy.

emergencyReady.name: Emergency Ready
emergencyReady.description: Official government disaster alert app. Emergency info on earthquakes, typhoons, air quality.

xeCurrency.name: XE Currency
xeCurrency.description: Real-time exchange rates. Useful global currency app for converting to Korean Won.
